FuncDef: This command adds one or more route sources to match the route unknown IP route prefix for a route unknown priority control event.

ParaDef.Info: Explicitly defined protocols. Values-bgp - This parameter defines BGP as an eligible route source for a returned route prefix from the RTM when looking up the route-unknown route prefix. The bgp parameter is not exclusive from the other available protocol parameters. If protocol is executed without the bgp parameter, a returned route prefix with a source of BGP will not be considered a match and will cause the event to enter the set state. This parameter only applies to the 7750 SR and 7950 XRS..

ExtraInfo: Default: no protocol - No route source for the route unknown priority event is defined.
